## ğŸ“¦ Manual Download

| Platform | File | Size |
|----------|------|------|
| ğŸ macOS Apple Silicon (M1/M2/M3) | `go-password-manager-macos-arm64` | ~31MB |

### How to run after download:
- **macOS/Linux**: `chmod +x filename && ./filename`
- **Windows**: Double-click the `.exe` file
